item.name: dagger
item.description: The dagger is a knife consisting of a short blade with a sharply tapered point, a central spine or fuller, and two cutting edges sharpened the full length of the blade.

item.name: shortsword
item.description: The shortsword is a two-edged blade made for cutting with a tapered point for stabbing during thrusting. A solid grip is equipped with a knobbed hilt with ridges for the fingers.

item.name: longsword
item.description: The longsword consists of a long two-edged blade measuring around 40 inches with a long,polished handle. The longsword is very popular due to its and versatile cutting and thrusting abilities.

item.name: claymore
item.decription: "The claymore is a two-handed sword measuring 60-70 inches overall, with an expanded cruciform hilt and a quillon block.

item.name: shortbow
item.description: The shortbow is a flexible shaft of wood (or horn or bone) about 3 to 4 feet long with the ends connected by strong cord or a gut string that is a little shorter than the shaft, causing the wood to bend and keep the string under tension.

item.name: longbow
item.description: The longbow is a flexible shaft of wood (or horn or bone) about 4 to 6 feet long with the ends connected by strong cord or a gut string that is a little shorter than the shaft, causing the wood to bend and keep the string under tension.
